How I will get to know about my updated diet Chart notification?
When I get Appointment notification?
What will be the plan start date?
When I get my plan explanation?
What Happened, if I am not available for Face to Face Appointment on my Consult Day?
What should I do in my weekly review?
Why you need food log every day?
Is weekly update applicable for Consult Week?
When I get my updated Food Contain in my Diet Chart?
How I can ask my Query during the Program?
How I can ask my Query in non-office hours?
Do I have call support?
Will I get call on my online consult?
How much call duration for review and Consult day if choose Online Mode?
What happens if I missed the weekly Review and Consult call?
How to inform, if I am/will go out of station?
What happened about my diet Chart if I travel out from home location?
How I can edit or delete my food dairy?
When my Monthly Body Fat Assessment will be?
During Menses Body Fat Assessment is applicable?
How I can share my Medical report to Diet4Health Nutri Team?
Can I visit Centre without my appointment?
How I Can get expected result from the program?
Is my NutriCoach will be same thought out the program?
How I will get more success in Diet4Health Program?
Can my family follow the same diet?
Can I transfer my program to my family member?
Do I get the printout of Diet Chart?
Can I get plan in different languages?
Can I Change Diet Plan Language in between the programme?
Can I register more than one contact number?
Can I get explanation and counselling more than one family member?
Do you have what’s app and SMS queries option?
Is my medical report compulsory to upload in dashboard?
How do escalate my Nutri support related issues?
How do escalate my App related support and issues?
Is meeting with Dietitian Arti Jain all the appointment?
If my doctor denied to follow the diet?
Can I hold my program in between?
Is there any Refund Policy?
You will get to know through SMS/Email/App Notification
SMS/ Email/ App Notification for Consultation you will get one working day prior.
The Diet Programme date starts from the day when we release the First Diet Chart.

You get your diet plan explanation after the diet plan is released on the portal on the working day as per your given convenient time. So in case, if the patient is not available at that time then it is assumed that the released diet plan suits you and will start following from next day.

You don’t need to worry, in that case you will have to submit weekly review form from App or Web, Our Team will release the Updated Diet Chart based on the strategy we discussed on the appointment day only. However, if you want to discuss, you may discuss with your NutriCoach for the same.

You need to submit Weekly review in every 7 days, also Food dairy and Weight Log need to be updated on daily basis, because both inputs play major role to monitor your Program Progress.Our Nutri Team update you the progress.
Because it plays major role to Identify the progress and Body Response of Individual.
Yes, Weekly Review is mandate for consult and review day both, as well as you need to update us food dairy, Daily weight log for progress monitoring purpose and to understand body response.
We update food cantain in Diet chart every alternate week as per start day of the Program.
Diet4Health provides you NutriChat Option where you can drop your Nutri related query, Our Team will respond you in working hour only. (TAT for response is 2 Hours)
You may use Offline Nutrichat option for the same, Our Nutri Team will resolve your query in working time.

No, Diet4health does not include call support in the programme, however we have provision 10 Mins Call duration in Weekly Review for better coordination. ‘NutriCoach make call only once to avoid disturbance in your schedule and in case of no response from your side, we put reminder over the chat, so that whenever You will free you may approach us(in working hour)
Yes, online consult day we will make a call as per mentioned time in weekly review submitted by you.
Your call duration for Review is 10 mins and for Consult is 15 mins.

Then no need to worry,In that case you may call back us in working hour we are ready to support, since we already called you and did not receive any response from you side we will assume that you must be busy in some other work and we will wait for your call back.
For any travelling plan you may inform us through Nutrichat option or if review or consult day, you may mention in review form too.
No need to worry, we change the Diet Chart as per your travel plan.
Edit and Delete option in food dairy are available in Web Dashboard However in Mobile App will be on roadmap.

We have scheduled Body Fat assessment 5th, 9th, 13th and 17th weeks only. Example If your Diet plan start date 01-Jan-19 than Body Fat assessment date will be 29-Jan-19 on same day. For female in case of menses it may differ because we avoid during menses day.
During menses cycle we avoid Body assessment. In that case member can postpone the body Fat Assessment day to next working day
You may upload the Reports in web Dashboard -> Patient Document ->view All-> Add

We request you to Use Appointment Request option in Web / App for rescheduling Appointment, We will try to adjust if Possible and confirm you the same or else in case of all slots busy we will mutually discuss and schedule your appointment for some other day.

Its very Simple you need to keep follow the Diet and Instruction which we suggested or you, you will have to keep connected to us through App/Web by updating all programme flow like weight log, Weekly Review and Health Update. *Disclaimer: Result may vary person to person*
Your case is handled under the supervision of Chief Dietitian and whole team of Diet4health (Nutri team). No need to worry for that.
You must be committed for your Health and keep updating us timely with your food Dairy, Weekly Review, Health as per the Program flow.
NO, because we provide customised Diet plan strategy only for you as every individual is different therefore need of food intake is also different.
No, Our Diet Programme only start once we do deep analysis of patient’s body parameters, and create customised strategy for him/her. Therefore transfer cannot possible.

No, because we believe in complete programme which is available on the dashboard/ Mobile App as time to time change in diet intake will also matter, however print media cannot give live update as per your requirement.

We provide Diet Chart in English and Hindi language as per your convenience but the language selection must be at the time of enrolment, but kindly note that if you select “Hindi” Language Mobile App will not support for the same, that will be available on Web Dashboard only.
No, you cannot change Diet Chart Language in between the programme.
No, we only communicate on registered number to avoid communication gap.
No, because your diet plan explanation and counselling remains confidential so the patient and his/her spouse/parents are allowed at a time.

No, all your queries are resolved through the Nutri chat option (Monday to Saturday- 10 am to 7 pm) which is there on the dashboard and in the app. Also, in the review week and consult week, all your queries are resolved through the call and chat option.
Yes, you may upload the Reports in web Dashboard -> Patient Document ->view All-> Add.
You may escalate Nutri support related issues through the Nutri chat option which is there on the dashboard and in the Mobile App.
You may put your concern in “Escalation tab” which is there on the dashboard and in the Mobile App.

As All the Diet4Health programme is under supervision of Dietitian Arti Jain and she only makes strategy for you, she monitor your health with help of Diet4Health Tools and programme flow, whenever need of change in strategy in the programme we will schedule your appointment with her.

Your diet plan strategy is made as per your health and body parameter requirements, so after studying the whole case the diet plan is made accordingly. And if in case there are other medical issues, diet plan is modified accordingly.
No, we do not have such kind of policy.
We do not have any refund policy.
